docs.text: Welcome to my docs Here you can find my references to basic robotics tools such as ros2, gazebo, and also mini projects I recommand for beginners to deal with.

docs.text: ROS2 For Beginners Install ROS2 and Setup Your Environment: I assume you have a virtual machine with Linux distribution on it (like Ubuntu). Use 𝑠𝑢𝑑𝑜 𝑎𝑝𝑡 𝑢𝑝𝑑𝑎𝑡𝑒 , 𝑠𝑢𝑑𝑜 𝑎𝑝𝑡 𝑢𝑝𝑔𝑟𝑎𝑑𝑒 , 𝑠𝑢𝑑𝑜 𝑎𝑝𝑡 𝑎𝑢𝑡𝑜𝑟𝑒𝑚𝑜𝑣𝑒 to make sure your system is up to date. Terminator
